thread.title: FIFA president Sepp Blatter could get 90-day ban
thread.title_full: FIFA president Sepp Blatter could get 90-day ban

title: FIFA president Sepp Blatter could get 90-day ban
text:
FIFA president Sepp Blatter could get 90-day ban Oct. 7, 2015 8:53 p.m. (0) Comments 
Sepp Blatter could be facing a 90-day suspension. 
The FIFA president's future was being determined by the governing body's ethics committee at meetings in Zurich, with Blatter at risk of being suspended after a criminal case was opened against him. 
Blatter associate Klaus Stoehlker , who has no role at FIFA, told The Associated Press and other media outlets the ethics committee's adjudicatory chamber recommended a 90-day suspension for the sport's most powerful official. 
"Blatter has heard that from several sources," Stoehlker said. "He has not got any message from the committee ...and he is perfectly under control. He is going to the office (Thursday)." 
Blatter's lawyer, Richard Cullen , said the president "has not been notified of any action taken by the FIFA ethics committee." Â© 2015 , Journal Sentinel Inc. All rights reserved.
